overview:
Chief Exec of social networking startup hairbyus.com.

Hairbyus.com is an easier way to share and discover hairstyles, and hairstylists wherever you are in the world. Hairbyus.com is a free service matching hair professionals to clients based on a clientâ€™s search preferences. Hair professionals and users can upload, share and discover all types of hairstyles.

Currently Treasurer of newly formed British Computer Society (BCS) Entrepreneurs Specialist Group working with IT leaders, entrepreneurs and organisations to assist entrepreneurs on their journey from startup to IPO.
